FuncDef:
The ioam command creates an IOAM view and displays the view, or displays an existing IOAM view.
The undo ioam command deletes a created IOAM view. The ioam command creates an IOAM view and displays the view, or displays an existing IOAM view. The undo ioam command deletes a created IOAM view. By default, no IOAM view is created. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
ExtraInfo: To use IOAM to monitor or measure traffic, run this command to enter the IOAM view.
